name: Magic Butterscotch With Nougat Ice Cream
description: Rich & Creamy Magic Butter scotch with Nougat ice cream is a dairy ice cream made from 100% Sri Lankan, Fresh Cow's milk, suitable for vegetarians. Rs.50 cents from every 1L of fresh milk collected is contributed to a special welfare fund "Sarubima" focused on empowering Farmers children through education. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
